title: Arcaea pack metadata
description: The metadatas of packs in Arcaea

id.description: The id of the pack, used in the songlist file

cost.description: The price of this pack in memories, however from 3.0.0 this will be controlled by server instead of keeped in packlist

custom_banner.description: Is a custom banner included in the cover image of the pack. If no, a banner will be automatically generated for this pack

plus_character.description: The id of the associated partner of the pack, -1 if there are none associated partner

name_localized.description: The name of the pack, localized in various languages

description_localized.description: The description of the pack used when the pack is not yet purchased, localized in various languages
